DIA_Candac_VZ_Ambient_03_03: As soon as we leave here, I'm going back to the monastery. After all this time, I need silence and prayer.
DIA_Candac_VZ_Ambient_03_02: Cursed beasts, we will send them all back to the world of Beliar!
DIA_Candac_VZ_Ambient_03_01: All this destruction...and to think that the most loyal servants of Innos were capable of it...
DIA_Candac_VZ_Ambient_03_04: You can rest assured. With my magic, no undead threatens us.
